author: 0xraino
content: hey <@!758579010027782144> , I believe the 1559 spec has the gas costs for access lists backwards

author: 0xraino
content: Notice that 2930 specifies address cost as  2400 and storage cost as 1900

author: marekm3498
content:
so just to introduce everyone to the topic:
I'm trying to connect to the new testnet and I have a problem on block 14. I see in the block one transaction with access_list, because of access_list Nethermind calculates gas usage to 25300 (+4300). Could you check the transaction? Maybe I did some wrong decoding or I'm using the wrong genesis, but on first look, it is okay that I have 25300.
